title: Drawing, "Interior of a Bavarian Cattle Stable; Study for the Head of an Ox", 1876
medium: Graphite on heavy cream wove paper
signed: Lower right in graphite with monogram [ W over S]
inscribed: Titled lower right in graphite: Polling
description: Interior view of a cattle shed showing an ox facing right and four resting cows at a feeding trough. At lower left, a graphite sketch of a head of an ox.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Interior of a Bavarian Cattle Stable; Study for the Head of an Ox", 1876. Graphite on heavy cream wove paper. 1912-16-109.
